title: Our Clinics — Men's Health Foundation
description: Learn about our clinics in West Hollywood and South Los Angeles at SoCal Men's Medical Group, a part of Men's Health Foundation.
cleaned_text: For more than twenty years, we have proudly provided top-quality care as Southern California Men's Medical Group, now a clinical partner with Men's Health Foundation. Proudly offering care from some of the best physicians in the country, our team is nationally renowned for our work in holistic health as well as HIV treatment and prevention. Specializing in men's health and sexual health, we welcome patients seeking care for cardiovascular disease, diabetes, HIV, hepatitis, aging, holistic health, cancer, behavioral health, ED, integrative medicine, and more. We take many public and private health plans, and if you are uninsured or underinsured, we can serve you too! OUR Primary Care LOCATIONS MHF Sunset [9201 Sunset Blvd, Suite 812, West Hollywood, California 90069](https://goo.gl/maps/p4Lj4ekZnep2pWZu7) Monday - Friday 8 a.m. - 5 p.m. PT For questions or appointment scheduling, call [310-550-1010](tel:+13105501010) or [request an appointment online](/book). To park, please use either the paid valet parking garage accessible at the entrance of 9201 W. Sunset Blvd. or nearby metered street parking. Please allow at least 15 minutes before your appointment to locate parking and arrive to Suite 812 on the 8th floor. MHF South LA [8601 S Broadway, Los Angeles, California 90003](https://goo.gl/maps/cvif4t1Gk6BaWL3j8) Monday - Thursday 11 a.m. - 8 p.m. PT Friday 9 a.m. - 6 p.m. PT For questions or appointment scheduling, call [323-905-5675](tel:+13239055675) or [request an appointment online](/book). To park, enter the free gated parking available in the nearby parking lot on Manchester Ave. by the 110 freeway exit, as well as street parking in the nearby area.
